member.name: N:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe
member.summary: This namespace contains types that are used for client and server synchronization in Sync Services for ADO.NET. The following namespaces are used in client and server synchronization: , , , and .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider
member.summary: Abstracts a client synchronization provider for SQL Server Compact that communicates with the client and shields the synchronization agent from the specific implementation of the client database.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a connection string parameter.
member.param: The string that is used to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server Compact database.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using connection string and database creation parameters.
member.param: The string that is used to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server Compact database.
true to create the client database if it does not exist; false not to create it. The default is true.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ApplyChangeFailed
member.summary: Occurs after a row could not be applied at the client.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ApplyingChanges
member.summary: Occurs before changes are applied at the client for a synchronization group.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ChangesApplied
member.summary: Occurs after all changes are applied at the client for a synchronization group.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ChangesSelected
member.summary: Occurs after all changes to be applied to the server for a synchronization group are selected from the client.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.CreatingSchema
member.summary: Occurs before the schema is created at the client for each table.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.SchemaCreated
member.summary: Occurs after the schema is created at the client for each table.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.SelectingChanges
member.summary: Occurs before all changes to be applied to the server for a synchronization group are selected from the client.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.SyncProgress
member.summary: Occurs during the selection and application of changes for a synchronization group at the client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.AcceptChanges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Updates tracking metadata for the specified tables so that pending changes for the specified tables are not uploaded during the next synchronization.
member.param: A collection of tables in the client database for which to accept changes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.AcceptChanges(System.String)
member.summary: Updates tracking metadata so that pending changes for the specified table are not uploaded during the next synchronization.
member.param: A table in the client database for which to accept changes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.AcceptChanges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Updates tracking metadata up to the specified anchor point so that pending changes for the specified tables at the client are not uploaded during the next synchronization.
member.param: A collection of tables in the client database for which to accept changes.
A object that represents the point up to which changes should be accepted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.AcceptChanges(System.String,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Updates tracking metadata up to the specified anchor point so that pending changes for the specified table at the client are not uploaded during the next synchronization.
member.param: A table in the client database for which to accept changes.
A object that represents the point up to which changes should be accepted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ApplyChanges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Data.DataSet,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Applies inserts, updates, and deletes for a synchronization group to the client database when given table names, a data set, and server anchor parameters.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A collection of tables in the client database for which to apply changes.
A object that contains the rows of data to be applied to the database.
A object that represents the value for this synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ApplyChanges(System.String,System.Data.DataSet,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Applies inserts, updates, and deletes for a synchronization group to the client database when given a table name, a data set, and server anchor parameters.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A table in the client database for which to apply changes.
A object that contains the rows of data to be applied to the database.
A object that represents the value for this synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ApplyChanges(Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncGroupMetadata,System.Data.DataSet,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncSession)
member.summary: Applies inserts, updates, and deletes for a synchronization group to the client database when given group metadata, a data set, and synchronization session parameters.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A object that contains metadata about the synchronization group.
A object that contains the rows of data to be applied to the client database.
A object that contains metadata about the current synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.BeginTransaction(Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncSession)
member.summary: Called by the to begin a transaction. This allows the agent to commit a set of changes as an atomic unit.
member.param: A object that contains metadata about the current synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.CreateSchema(Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncTable,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncSchema)
member.summary: Creates the table schema in the client database if the schema does not exist.
member.param: A object that contains settings for the table that will be created, such as the direction of synchronization.
A object. This object is a that contains schema information for the table that will be created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources that are used by the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.EndTransaction(System.Boolean,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncSession)
member.summary: Called by the to end a transaction. This allows the agent to commit a set of changes as an atomic unit.
member.param: true to commit the transaction; false to roll back the transaction.
A object that contains metadata about the current synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.Finalize
member.summary: Is the destructor for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.GetChanges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets inserts, updates, and deletes from the specified tables at the client that occurred since the last time or was called.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A collection of tables in the client database for which to get changes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.GetChanges(System.String)
member.summary: Gets inserts, updates, and deletes from the specified table at the client that occurred since the last time or was called.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A table in the client database for which to get changes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.GetChanges(Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncGroupMetadata,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncSession)
member.summary: Gets inserts, updates, and deletes for the specified synchronization group and session that occurred at the client since the last time or was called.
member.returns: A object that contains data changes and anchor values and other metadata for a synchronization session.
member.param: A object that contains metadata about the synchronization group.
A object that contains metadata about the current synchronization session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.GetTableReceivedAnchor(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a object that contains the time when the last change was received from the server.
member.returns: A object that contains the time when the last change was received from the server.
member.param: The name of the table.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.GetTableSentAnchor(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a object that contains the time when the last change was sent from the client.
member.returns: A object that contains the time when the last change was sent from the client.
member.param: The name of the table.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An object that contains event data.

member.summary: Raises the event.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.OnInitialized
member.summary: Raises the Initialized event.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A object that contains event data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.SetTableReceivedAnchor(System.String,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Sets a object that contains the time that the last change was received from the server.
member.param: The name of the table.
A object, with the anchor value to persist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.SetTableSentAnchor(System.String,Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SyncAnchor)
member.summary: Sets a object that contains the time when the last change was sent from the client.
member.param: The name of the table.
A object, with the anchor value to persist.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the GUID that Sync Services uses to identify the client database.
member.returns: A GUID that identifies the client database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ConflictResolver
member.summary: Gets a object for the client synchronization provider, which determines what action to take when a conflict occurs.
member.returns: A object that determines what action to take when a conflict occurs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.Connection
member.summary: Gets the object that is used to connect to the client database.
member.returns: An object that is used to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server Compact database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the string that is used to connect to the client database.
member.returns: The string that is used to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server Compact database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.CreateDatabaseIfNotExists
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to create the client database if it does not exist.
member.returns: true to create the client database if it does not exist; false not to create it.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeClientSyncProvider.RetentionInDays
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days that change-tracking metadata is stored in a SQL Server Compact 3.5 database.
member.returns: The number of days that change-tracking metadata should be stored in a SQL Server Compact 3.5 database.
